author: jgm
content: As per earlier discussion regarding rewards for validators in phase 0 I took a look at the current validator rewards curve and hae made a couple of suggestions as to how it may be altered.  Details at https://hackmd.io/PJu5CGTcRGO1r7BqYrWNPw?view - questions and comments welcome.

author: jgm
content: Put this up on ethresear.ch so that any discussion doesn't flood this channel: https://ethresear.ch/t/alteration-to-0-9-validator-rewards-calculation/6467
